channel.title: Posts on Jayke
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Jayke

item.title: Making virtual art physical - Part 1
item.description: Time for my first actual post! Let me tell you about my latest hobby project. This is part 1 in a two-part series - strap in! Drarwing About two months ago, my colleague Berry shared his latest project: Drarwing. I wholeheartedly suggest reading the blog post (and the subsequent post about how he turned it into a web-hosted tool here), but in short, Drarwing takes a photo, and using a generative approach, turns it into a painting.

item.title: Hello, world!
item.description: I figured it was time to do something with the jayke.nl domain that I’ve had for a long time play around with some static site generation tooling and create a place where I can jot down some of my thoughts, or indulge in shameless self-promotion over some of the hobby projects I have done. Let’s see what comes of this. I’ll figure out over time whether I have anything relevant to share.
